content: प्रेरणं, --णा {@--1@} Driving or urging on, impelling, inciting, instigation. {@--2@} Impulse, passion. {@--3@} Throwing, casting; ह्नीमूढानां भवति विफलप्रेरणा चूर्णमुष्टिः <ls>Me. 68.</ls> {@--4@} Sending, despatching. {@--5@} Order, direction. {@--6@} (In <ab>gram.</ab>) The sense of the causal form. {@--7@} Activity, exertion.
